coreAttributes.authorTag: Underneath the gourd it reads 'Look for the Green Villager'.
coreAttributes.name: Sake
coreAttributes.description: A dried gourd containing shake. #IF(!game.isSillyModeEnabled()) There a Number eight that is taped on the gourd, at least you think that it's an eight. #ELSE There's a drawing depicting a dark furred raccoon dog-boy with an eye patch. He's carrying large crate of shake on one hand and the other hand waving a sake. He looks like he's howling. #ENDIF
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/25)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_RESISTANCE_ICE, 5)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.5)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first removing the cork, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the gourd of Sake up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. Only happy thoughts is going thorough [npc.her] head.
